Copies the offsets of a character and a few interactions, disable it by removing this line or leaving it blank. Clones of BF variants that aren't just BF have their left and right animations swapped, so be warned.
If set to true, forces antialiasing to be disabled, useful for Pixel characters
Duration of character sing animation's mult, Dad clones use 6.1 while everyone else uses 4
Makes the character use danceRight/danceLeft animations instead of Idle, useful for Skid & Pump/GF clones
Changes the healthbar color for the character.
Flips X axis from the sprite, useful for Boyfriend and Pico clones

The idle/sing/miss animations are added automatically with the same values as your clone character's, you just have to add animations to this array if you want to edit something or add new animations to it
Your character's offset ingame, represented as Player 1's X and Y values, and the Player 2's
This formatting's based on Shadow Mario's (FNF Multiplayer creator) config.json files for FNF Multiplayer, so these files *should* be cross compatible.
